attributes.action: Oppose the statue of Mahatma Gandhi going up in leicester
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Against a statue of Mahatma Gandhi going up in Leicester, iv seen a petition for, by my local MP but not against, here is one against the statue of Mahatma Gandhi going up in leicester

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
